Test Name: Mumps Virus Antibodies (IgG and IgM), Spinal Fluid
Purpose: To detect IgG (past immunity) and IgM (recent infection) antibodies to mumps virus in spinal fluid via enzyme immunoassay.
Equipment: Enzyme immunoassay (EIA) analyzer, micropipettes, 96-well EIA plates, plate washer, plate reader, incubator, refrigerator
